original_text: My relatives have left me. My best friends have forgotten me. My relatives have left me. My best friends have forgotten me. My relatives have left me.
korean_text: 내 친척은 나를 버렸으며 가까운 친지들은 나를 잊었구나

sentences.original_text: My best friends have forgotten me.
sentences.korean_translation: 내 가장 친한 친구들이 나를 잊었습니다.

sentences.original_text: My best friends have forgotten me.
sentences.korean_translation: 내 가장 친한 친구들이 나를 잊었습니다.
